message_1:
A Rail Fence Cipher text with 6 rails has been encrypted as follows:   

         h o l e s i n o n e   

         o e n l e n i h s o   

         l s n e o e i n e l   

What is the Rail Fence Cipher text after decryption?
message_2:
To decrypt the Rail Fence Cipher text, we need to follow the zigzag pattern of the rails and read the characters in the order they appear. Here is the text rearranged according to the zigzag pattern:

h       o       l       e       s       i       n       o       n       e
  o   e   n   l   e   n   i   h   s   o
    l       s       n       e       o       e       i       n       e       l

Now, we read the characters along the zigzag pattern:

h -> o -> l -> e -> s -> i -> n -> o -> n -> e -> o -> e -> n -> l -> e -> n -> i -> h -> s -> o -> l -> s -> n -> e -> o -> e -> i -> n -> e -> l

The decrypted Rail Fence Cipher text is: "holesinoneoenlenihslsneoineel"
